divs: sighting detailsi believe it occurred in 2003, i would have been 13 years old at the time. i know it was on christmas morning because i was opening some presents in front of the large window facing east. i remember this event very clearly, i have just now decided to report it. i looked southeast out the window when i noticed a group of approximately 4 small silver spherical objects. i don't particularly know why i looked out the window at the objects. these spheres seemed to be a large distance away, and from that distance they seemed small although because of the distance involved their actual size is hard for me to determine. these objects began "dancing" around one another, as is described by many other sightings of ufos. they moved in straight lines (no curves) and because their distance away from me they seemed to be moving very fast. they would move quickly in straight lines to one position and then halt, however they did not all move at the same time they did appear to be moving in some sort of coordination with one-another. because of my house's close relatively close proximity to o'hare international airport i do see many aircraft move across the sky, this was my first assumption but after seeing the phenomenal motion exhibited it had caught my attention as being something else. let me stress that these objects did not display aircraft like maneuvering. they moved quickly; seeing a 747 move from a distance, even at 400 mph, is like watching a snail move across the pavement, however these objects moved rapidly, with instantaneous acceleration, and stopped without noticeable deceleration. they only moved a couple inches in my view, but given the distance they were from me they could have been miles apart from one-another. after approximately three minutes of watching these objects "dance" with one another, at astonishing speeds and angular movement, they one-by-one instantaneously disappeared. they did not quickly fly away, they just disappeared from sight in less than a blink of an eye. there were no clouds that morning, clear skies. they had not moved near any clouds\objects that could have obstructed their view. they were there one second and gone the next, one-by-one disappearing. after watching them disappear in astonishment i answered my parents, of course they wondered where my mind had traveled off to. i felt simply amazed as i watched the objects, and afterwards i felt a sort of reverence for what i had seen. it was a long time ago, but the event is crystal clear in my mind. what a christmas present!
Summary: Small Silver Spheres (apx 4) a large distance away dance around one another
